title: Fizzy pop cheesecakes
description: Three baked cheesecakes are flavoured with childhood favourite fizzy drinks and extravagantly decorated with Italian meringue.You will need 3 springform cake tins (1 x 20cm/8in, 1 x 18cm/7in tin and 1 x 15cm/6in), plus cake boards of the same same size and straws or cake dowels to support the tiers.
ingredients: 3 medium free-range eggs and 1 free-range egg yolk
2 balls stem ginger in syrup, ginger chopped
4 tbsp stem ginger syrup (reserved from the stem ginger jar)
